A4.text: The Eagles went on to win 41–33, capturing their first Super Bowl Vince Lombardi Trophy in franchise history

A5.text: the Eagles won Super Bowl LIX

A6.text: It was the Eagles' third Super Bowl appearance and their first win in franchise history.

A7.text: In Super Bowl LII, the Philadelphia Eagles defeated the defending champion Patriots 41–33, ending a 57-year championship drought for the franchise.
